Description: Provide secure, isolated workspaces for each customer organization
As a platform user, I want to securely authenticate using email/password or SSO so that I can access my organization's workspace
Acceptance Criteria:
- Email/password authentication with bcrypt hashing
- JWT tokens with 24h expiry and refresh tokens
- Google OAuth 2.0 integration
- Microsoft Azure AD integration
- Password reset via email
- Account lockout after 5 failed attempts
- Session management (view/revoke active sessions)

Description: Design users, sessions, tokens tables

Summary: Implement JWT service with RS256 signing
Description: Create JWT generation and validation service
POST /auth/login, POST /auth/register, POST /auth/logout
Google OAuth 2.0 integration
Microsoft Azure AD OAuth integration
Password reset with email templates

Summary: Add rate limiting and account lockout
Description: Rate limiting per IP, lockout after 5 failures
View/revoke active sessions
As a platform administrator, I want to create and manage organizations so that customers have isolated workspaces
Acceptance Criteria:
- Create organization with name, domain, settings
- Invite users to organization via email
- Role-based access control (Owner, Admin, Member, Viewer)
- Organization-level settings
- Data isolation between tenants
- Organization suspension/deletion

Description: Design organizations table with tenant isolation
Add organization_id context to all queries
Organization management endpoints
Email-based user invitations
Role-based access control system
As a logged-in user, I want to see a dashboard with my projects and recent activity so that I can quickly navigate to my work
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboard shows active projects (BUILD/RUN)
- Recent activity feed (last 20 actions)
- Pending approvals counter with quick access
- Quick actions menu
- Navigation sidebar
- User profile menu
- Responsive design

Description: Provide reliable, scalable data storage with full audit capabilities
As a developer, I want a well-designed database schema so that the platform can scale and maintain data integrity
Acceptance Criteria:
- PostgreSQL with proper indexes
- Multi-tenant schema with organization_id
- Soft delete support
- Audit columns
- Database migrations
- Seed data

Description: As a platform, I want to store and search document embeddings efficiently so that AI agents can retrieve relevant knowledge
Acceptance Criteria:
- pgvector extension enabled
- Documents table with vector column
- HNSW index for similarity search
- Multiple knowledge bases per org
- Chunking metadata

Description: Provide secure, scalable API infrastructure
As a frontend developer, I want a well-documented REST API so that I can build the UI efficiently
Acceptance Criteria:
- OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- Consistent error response format
- Request validation
- Rate limiting per organization
- API versioning (v1)
- Swagger UI documentation

Description: As a user, I want to receive real-time updates so that I see agent progress and approvals immediately
Acceptance Criteria:
- WebSocket server with authentication
- Room-based subscriptions
- Event types: agent_update, approval_request, notification
- Automatic reconnection
- Presence tracking

Description: Enable structured BUILD/RUN processes with clear phase gates
As a project manager, I want to move projects through defined phases so that delivery follows a consistent process
Acceptance Criteria:
- BUILD workflow: Intake → Discovery → Scoping → Design → Approval → Build → Testing → Release → Hypercare
- RUN workflow: Intake → Triage → Execute → Validate → Close
- State transitions with validation
- Phase entry/exit timestamps
- Workflow history

Description: As a project stakeholder, I want to see the current phase and progress visually so that I understand where the project stands
Acceptance Criteria:
- Visual workflow timeline
- Current phase highlighted
- Completed phases with timestamps
- Upcoming phases with requirements
- Phase detail modal
- Phase transition buttons

Description: Ensure human oversight on all critical decisions
As an AI agent, I want to request human approval before taking action so that humans remain in control of decisions
Acceptance Criteria:
- Type A: Acknowledgement (low-risk)
- Type B: Approval (scope, design)
- Type C: Go/No-Go (production)
- Context and diff in request
- Role-based routing
- Expiration handling
- Escalation rules

Description: As an approver, I want to see exactly what I'm approving with a visual diff so that I can make informed decisions
Acceptance Criteria:
- Approval inbox
- Visual diff viewer
- Context panel
- Approve/Reject with comment
- Bulk approval for Type A
- Mobile-friendly

Description: As an approver, I want to receive notifications for pending approvals so that I don't miss time-sensitive requests
Acceptance Criteria:
- In-app notifications
- Email notifications
- Slack notifications
- Teams notifications
- User preferences
- Digest mode

Description: Provide complete traceability for compliance and debugging
As a compliance officer, I want every action to generate an immutable receipt so that we have complete audit trail
Acceptance Criteria:
- Every action logged with full context
- Immutable storage
- Cryptographic hash chain
- Export to compliance formats

Description: As an administrator, I want to search and view audit logs so that I can investigate issues

- Search by date, user, agent, action
- Filter by project, entity, status
- Timeline view
- Evidence preview
- Export results
- Verify hash chain
